attributes.additional_details:
When exactly is someone an adult 18,25 or even 16........ its seems u can die for your country at 18 in the forces on full adult pay,...... if u leave the army and are unemployed at 22 you cant get adult JSA because u are not  an adult..... not 25 or over.....although at 15 you can travel on a bus as a child but at 16 your an adult???
I would like the Government to discuss this and actually make a decision on what age adulthood is.
